template.name: term_rejected
template.description: Send an email to participant to inform him that the term he proposed is rejected.
template.subject: Voicing Climate Concerns: your glossary submission has been rejected.
template.content:
{user.loginname},
You recently submitted the term "${term.name}" to the Voicing Climate Concerns glossary. After reviewing your submission, the moderator has decided not to include it in the public glossary, for the following reason:
"${reason}"
Thank you for your participation,
Voicing Climate Concerns

template.name: post_reply
template.description: Send an email notification to participants whose post are replied.
template.subject: New discussion activity
template.content:
${user.loginname},
Somebody has contributed a new comment to the following discussion:
${reply.title}
Follow this link to view the discussion:
${url}
Thanks for your participation,
Voicing Climate Concerns

template.name: feedback
template.description: Send an email notification to moderator that participant commits a feedback.
template.subject: LIT: New feedback item submitted
template.content:
A user has just submitted the following feedback:
${feedback}

template.name: registration
template.description: Send an email notification to user that their account has been created.
template.subject: Welcome to Voicing Climate Concerns
template.content:
Welcome to Voicing Climate Concerns,

Your user account has been successfully created. Your Login Name is ${loginname}. Your participant id number is ${webqid}. (You will need this number to access surveys.) Thanks for becoming the newest participant in the LIT Challenge. You will receive an email soon when the website is ready for your participation.

See you online soon!
VCC moderators

template.name: announcement
template.description: Send an email to notify participants of announcements.
template.subject: LIT: New Moderator Announcement
template.content:
The LIT Moderator has posted a new system announcement:

${announcement}

template.name: modpasswordreset
template.description: Send an email to user that their password was reset by the moderator
template.subject: LIT: Password Reset
template.content:
The LIT Moderator has reset your password to: ${newpassword}

You can change your password by clicking on the User Settings button in the LIT system

template.name: recoverpassword
template.description: Send a password recovery to the user, allows them to reset their password
template.subject: LIT: Password Recovery
template.content:
Your password recovery code is: ${code}
This code is used to reset your password and will expire in 30 minutes.

Please follow the link below to reset your password: Password Recovery

If the link above does not work copy and paste the following URL into your browsers location bar:
http://www.climateconcerns.org/resetpassword.do?code=${code}
